description: Esky --Electronics SkyThe Wireless N PCI Adapter BL-LW04-A2 allows you to connect a desktop computer to a wireless network and access high-speed Internet connections. Compliant with IEEE 802.11n, it provides wireless speed up to 300Mbps, ideal for the online gaming, HD video streaming, or sending strong and reliable signals over long distances. This product can perfectly interoperate with all the 802.11n/g/b devices. Additionally, BL-LW04-A2 adapter supports QSS function, which can help you create a wireless connection with effortless security setup to prevent outside intrusion and protect your personal information from being exposed. Featuring high performance transmission rates, simple installation and adaptability as well as strong security, BL-LW04-A2 adapter is a perfect solution for small office and home need.SpecificationStandards: IEEE 802.11n, IEEE 802.11g, IEEE 802.11bWireless Signal Rates WithAutomatic Fallback11g: Up to 54Mbps(dynamic)11n: Up to 300Mbps(dynamic)11b: Up to 11Mbps(dynamic)Frequency Range: 2.4-2.4835GHzWireless Transmit Power: 15dBm(MAX EIRP)Modulation Type: OFDM/CCK/16-QAM/64-QAMReceiver Sensitivity (without antenna)270M: -70dBm@10% PER130M: -68dBm@10% PER108M: -68dBm@10% PER54M: -68dBm@10% PER11M: -85dBm@8% PER6M: -88dBm@10% PER1M: -90dBm@8% PERWork Mode: Ad-Hoc; InfrastructureWireless Security: 64/128 bit WEP; WPA/WPA2,WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK(TKIP/AES)Support Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/Win7/LinuxInterface: Standard 32-bit PCI 2.2 or HigherCertifications: CE, FCCPackage Includes:- 1 x Wireless Adapter; 1 x Resource CD; 1 x Quick Installation Guide
title: Esky 802.11g Wireless WIFI PCI Adapter Card For Desktop with Detachable Antenna
